column4: why does the network manager applet not have the up/down arrows for a direct connection in natty?
why does the network manager applet not have the up/down arrows for a direct connection in natty?
the icon for network manager/applet, is set by the theme.
sure, but it should change to the up/down arrow when i have an ethernet connection no?
again, it all depends on the theme...
what is it now, unplugged ethernet cable?
now it's the empty wireless wave
dunno man, does changing your theme change it?
how do i change my theme..
probably in your system settings, i'm not using gnome/unity anymore.. so i'm not 100% sure

you can install those GUI's from the repositories
